alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Montgomery; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:27PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Montgomery, southeastern Waller and northwestern Harris Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hockley, or 12 miles southeast of Prairie View, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hockley, Waller and Pine Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
